title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 101.4 - Alternates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 101.4 - Alternates

State Regulations

Each member of the board may, by official order filed in the
office of the agency of which he is commissioner or director, designate a
deputy or other representative in such agency to perform his duties on the
board. The bureau shall be notified in writing of any
designation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
101.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
